attributes.action: Make Politics and Economics compulsory in secondary education
attributes.additional_details:
43% of 18-24 year olds voted in the 2015 general elections
78% of 65+ year olds voted in the 2015 general elections
attributes.background: Make Politics and Economics compulsory in the national curriculum in secondary education - help educate our youth about political issues and increase participation in politics to help enhance our democracy
